mapper.sql: SELECT A.id id ,A.name name ,trim(A.name) titleInUrl ,A.korean_name koreanName ,A.version version ,A.type_code typeCode ,(select B.name from COMMON_CODE B where common_set = 'fermentable_type' and A.type_code = B.common_code) as typeKorean ,A.yield yield ,A.color color ,A.color_code colorCode ,A.add_after_boil addAfterBoil ,A.origin_code originCode ,(select B.name from COMMON_CODE B where common_set = 'nation_code' and A.origin_code = B.common_code) as originKorean ,A.supplier supplier ,A.notes notes ,A.coarse_fine_diff coarseFineDiff ,A.moisture moisture ,A.diastatic_power diastaticPower ,A.protein protein ,A.max_in_batch maxInBatch ,A.recommend_mash recommendMash ,A.specific_gravity specificGravity ,A.insert_id insertId ,A.insert_date insertDate ,A.update_id updateId ,A.update_date updateDate ,A.delete_id deleteId ,A.delete_date deleteDate FROM FERMENTABLES A

SELECT b.name name ,b.korean_name koreanName ,b.version version ,a.amount amount ,a.fermentable_use fermentableUse ,a.type_code typeCode ,b.yield yield ,b.color color ,b.color_code colorCode ,b.add_after_boil addAfterBoil ,b.origin origin ,b.supplier supplier ,b.notes notes ,b.coarse_fine_diff coarseFineDiff ,b.moisture moisture ,b.diastatic_power diastaticPower ,b.protein protein ,b.max_in_batch maxInBatch ,b.recommend_mash recommendMash ,b.ibu_gal_per_lb ibuGalPerLb ,b.specific_gravity specificGravity ,b.insert_id insertId ,b.insert_date insertDate ,b.update_id updateId ,b.update_date updateDate ,b.delete_id deleteId ,b.delete_date deleteDate FROM RECIPE_FERMENTABLE a LEFT OUTER join FERMENTABLES b on a.fermentable_seq = b.seq WHERE a.fermentable_seq = b.seq
mapper.select: SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FERMENTABLES WHERE ORIGIN_CODE = 'US') usCnt, (SELECT B.name FROM COMMON_CODE B WHERE common_set = 'nation_code' AND B.common_code = 'US') AS usCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FERMENTABLES WHERE ORIGIN_CODE = 'DE') deCnt, (SELECT B.name FROM COMMON_CODE B WHERE common_set = 'nation_code' AND B.common_code = 'DE') AS deCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FERMENTABLES WHERE ORIGIN_CODE = 'UK') ukCnt, (SELECT B.name FROM COMMON_CODE B WHERE common_set = 'nation_code' AND B.common_code = 'UK') AS ukCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FERMENTABLES WHERE ORIGIN_CODE = 'BE') beCnt, (SELECT B.name FROM COMMON_CODE B WHERE common_set = 'nation_code' AND B.common_code = 'BE') AS beCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FERMENTABLES WHERE ORIGIN_CODE = 'CA') caCnt, (SELECT B.name FROM COMMON_CODE B WHERE common_set = 'nation_code' AND B.common_code = 'CA') AS caCntName, (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM FERMENTABLES WHERE ORIGIN_CODE != 'US' AND ORIGIN_CODE != 'DE' AND ORIGIN_CODE != 'UK' AND ORIGIN_CODE != 'BE' AND ORIGIN_CODE != 'CA') etcCnt, (SELECT B.name FROM COMMON_CODE B WHERE common_set = 'nation_code' AND B.common_code = 'ETC') AS etcCntName FROM DUAL
